command: kubectl create cronjob persona-keepalive -n personas --image=curlimages/curl:8.8.0 --schedule="17 */8 * * *" -- sh -lc 'curl -sS -X POST https://api.example-social.test/v1/users/artisanal_outreach/posts -H "Authorization: Bearer tok_test_123456" -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"text\":\"Quick tip: kubelet logs are your friend when debugging node issues. #kubernetes #sre\"}"' -o json
explanation: Schedules periodic low-noise posts to keep the persona active and credible over time.
rationale_steps: Create a CronJob that executes a small JSON POST on a predictable cadence.
Maintains steady, benign activity to avoid account dormancy flags.
